Reviews.Content: Got the Samsung through the Marriott Rewards program (155K points). Picture quality is beyond my expectations, it looks great and has a plethora of ports including 4 HDMI and 2 USB.  I tested the USB port with a standard USB flash drive loaded with music, videos and pictures.  It was able to display the pictures perfectly including a slide show, the video looked great (I only tried .MOV videos) and the music played beautifully through the speakers. One port that was missing was a headset port.  Only reason I looked for it was so that I could connect external speakers to provide extra base for those MNF parties. I was able to connect those speakers to the "audio out" 3.5mm stereo port but I cannot control the volume of the external speakers through the TV (I have to walk up to the external speakers to adjust their volume from them directly).  Not the end of the world but if there were a headset port I would have been able to adjust both TV and ext speaker volume from the TV remote.  I have a Dynex 32 inch LCD as well that has the headset port and this works well on that TV but that's the only advantage of the Dynex, which is a bargain LCD. Overall everyone in the house is thrilled with the Samsung!!!

Reviews.Title: look around..you may be disappointed here
Reviews.Author: aintso
Reviews.Content: I am new to the world of flat screens so I spent lots of time looking and reading reviews. After an hour of studying the various offerings in the stores I decided on this one. I have been so disappointed with the very poor picture quality and coarse color mix. I have been through the E-manual over and over again and have applied all of the controls but nothing seems to work. I almost feel it is a case of bait and switch. From my comparisons in the stores there are many 32" models at about half the price of this TV that are much better quality. This TV shows poor color quality and a fuzzy and blurry picture...I think I made a poor selection

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40" LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: I have had a Samsung TV in the past actually this one replaced the one I had before. The quality of Samsung is still among the best for televisions that I have seen. I looked around for a lot of televisions and when this one dropped down to the right price it was a no brainer. This TV has exceeded my expectations in picture quality and functions that come with it. If you are looking for a good 40" and not ready to go into LED or 120hz then this is the television for you. I tried an LED/120hz LG TV once and it was just weird looking, kind of hard to explain which is why I chose a non LED TV. Again this television is a really good one and worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Best tv I have owned
Reviews.Author: AK529
Reviews.Content: I totally love this tv. I was so happy with my 32 inch from Samsung that I bought the 40 inch version for our smaller living room. For the price of $500 you can't go wrong. I did look at the competing Sony version. The Samsung just seemed to have a better picture quality and much more features for the same price. The Sony version didn't offer picture in picture, USB playback of video files like mkv and avi. Also the Sony only had 2 hdmi ports versus the Samsung which has 4. Finally the sony doesn't dlna which this Samsung has. I am very impressed with the picture and sound quality.  I can't really think of anything I would want that isn't included for this price. I guess it would be nice to have wifi included and apps. I can add wifi with the Samsung adapter for about $60. This will allow me to use the dlna feature and the wifi remote with an apple or android device. Again at this point I can't think any negative point about this tv. Just make sure to properly calibrate the picture and sound settings to get the tvs full potential. Also make sure to use hdmi cables for all hd sources. I've tried this tv with my Sony blu ray player, my pc and my hd pvr all with hdmi cables all with excellent picture and sound quality.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 37" LCD TV
Reviews.Author: niblik03
Reviews.Content: Consumers Reports reported that this TV was one of the best on the market and I concur completely. The picture without any adjustments on my part was excellent.

Reviews.Title: worth the money
Reviews.Author: GFD
Reviews.Content: I returned the 32 inch TV due to the size in a larger room and the speaker rattled with deep base. I guessed a larger TV/frame would not rattle and I was right.  The picture is great.  A pleasure to watch.  I have been a Sony fan forever...I think those days are over.

Reviews.Title: great bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Jan Sorensen "cyber shopper"
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement TV after our house was robbed. It was easy to set up and has a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Over 2 years later, I still love this TV
Reviews.Author: Bobby Shornock
Reviews.Content: A lot of the newer Samsung Models took out the Component Audio inputs, however, this TV is awesome.  I have the LN40B650 and I am very impressed with not only the quality of the image, but also the amount of connections in the back.2 USB, 1 HDMI, 1 Component Audio inputs on the side, this is awesome when I have devices I interchange.  I use the Composite Audio on the side because when I take my PS3 over to friends houses, they are still using Analog TV's.  I also picked up a pair of Turtle Beach PX21 Headset, and I also put this in the side of the TV, to make it easy to get out.  The HDMI on the side is great for connecting my laptop to my TV for video or gaming playback.2 Composite AV is great because I have my PSP hooked up to my TV, and if I have another device to hook up.  Another Component Audio cable in the back, 3 HDMI slots in the back of the TV, great for both of my PS3's and my DVR box.There is not a thing I can say badly about this TV, awesome picture, now a much cheaper price than the $1,000 I paid for it, but it was and is still worth every penny I paid for it.  I highly recommend this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG
Reviews.Author: blueclicker
Reviews.Content: TV IS GREAT. PICTURE IS VERY GOOD. PRICE WAS LOWER THAN COMPETITORS ON THE ON THE SAME TV. SHIPPING WAS VERY FAST. NOT VERY EASY TO SET UP FOR THE OLDER GENERATION. BUT OVERALL GREAT.

Reviews.Title: This is worth the price
Reviews.Author: KP
Reviews.Content: This is worth the price. Better than Sony Bravia. Power cable is short - Could have been 2-4 ft longer.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Buy
Reviews.Author: Janet Edgar
Reviews.Content: We love this TV, our first LCT HDTV - there is absolutely nothing wrong with it, and the price is right too.  We couldn't be happier with it.

Reviews.Title: Nothing to complain about
Reviews.Author: Filip L. Hanik "Phillip"
Reviews.Content: If they could make a screen that reflected glare, then this would be perfect. But we are very happy with this product, and it was a very reasonable price. For the price, I don't think you can get a better TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: alves
Reviews.Content: good picture quality  excellent features but poor sound quality. I hope samsung improve on this area, with their latest model

Reviews.Title: Exceptional
Reviews.Author: Ronald L. Newhouse "Poupon Ron"
Reviews.Content: I am more than satisfied with the quality and features of this tv.  I don,t think i could have chose a better tv .

Reviews.Title: Love our tv
Reviews.Author: susie
Reviews.Content: Love our samsung tv, it is the best tv we gave ever purchased, great picture, sound, just love everything abound this tv, looks great in our room

Reviews.Title: GOOD VALUE FOR THE DOLLARS SPENT.
Reviews.Author: J. A. Topps
Reviews.Content: I've had this 40" set for over two years and have had none of the reported problems. It works fine, has a great picture and has been a joy to use. I have added a sound bar and that makes a lot of difference in the sound quality.

Reviews.Title: Best TV I ever owned..and I owned MANY
Reviews.Author: A. Tomaszewski
Reviews.Content: Well I purchased this in 2011 as a replacement to my 60" 1080p Sony rear projection and I couldn't be any happier. I have OCD when it comes to the quality of the picture so yeah, I owned a couple top of the line Sonys around 2009-2011 and I still cant believe this TV outperformed them in every aspect. I got over the 120hz gimmicky tv options with my Sony rear projection and XBR5 really fast, its just pointless and at the time that tech was overpriced like a SOB. Right now im sold on Samsung TV's, I read that they were the best around for LCD tech and well its true. If you want an awesome TV without all the gimmicks that usually end up spiking the price then this is your best bet, period.

Reviews.Title: Crap quality
Reviews.Author: Terrils "Terrils"
Reviews.Content: I bought this television at the beginning of 2012 and used it regularly, not constantly. The screen has now turned orange - the kind of orange that means it's completely fried. The nearest service is more than 90 minutes' drive away. For $500-plus, I expect a TV to last longer than a year and a half. My next TVs will not be Samsung.

Reviews.Title: samsung LCD TV
Reviews.Author: elvis presley
Reviews.Content: samsung tv so far after 2 years of use has a brilliant picture color, comes in a box, the stand had to be connected to the tx, very easy to connect to the tv, so far the tv is working great, has an excellent picture quality, well worth the money paid for it, hope it lasts a long time

Reviews.Title: Love my Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: irene finke
Reviews.Content: I love this TV!  I've had it over a year now and I have no complaints whatsoever.  I watch mostly TV shows and movies (very little sports), and it's perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Jana Lass
Reviews.Content: I love this TV! It is a good size has a great picture and audio quality is good too. It fits my small living room perfectly.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG Taking OVER
Reviews.Author: DuckChees
Reviews.Content: A company that started the flat-screen craze.  by the time you read this review there will most likely be a better product out there, but I was a college student and feel that sometimes price is the only factor.  it was very reasonable I would suggest buying it around cyber Monday deals or sometime in the summer where the deals are also very good.  Received it on-time and not damaged.  cant complain had it a year and it has severed me well.  Also i do like having a Samsung computer and phone making connectivity to all devices seamless.  I would recommend this and most likely purchase from them again.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: non swimmer
Reviews.Content: black and white adjustment from factory was poor.  might be better after adjustments. internet tips not for the non-savvy. colors good. not super-sharp picture

Reviews.Title: Nice pirce nice quality
Reviews.Author: VrooooM! "VrooooM!"
Reviews.Content: Got the 32" for my dad in his reading roomPicture quality is good and the price is nice for its size.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price, awesome service
Reviews.Author: Pw
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Samsung 46 inch LN46D550 as a family holiday present before Christmas. To our surprise and delight the TV was shipped the next day and arrived without a scratch. Assembly was easy and we were able to get it up and running in no time. We are thrilled with our new HDTV and are loving the bigger screen size. Thanks so much!

Reviews.Title: Works great as a computer monitor
Reviews.Author: gary ebdon
Reviews.Content: I am one year in to this Samsung 32" TV, using it as a computer monitor for my work.  Zero complaints, it all works great !

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Picture
Reviews.Author: Cari
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great and it has enough HDMI ports to support all our game consoles. Well packaged and early deliver.

Reviews.Title: Owner for 3yrs!
Reviews.Author: brenda
Reviews.Content: Best tv ever! Had this tv for over 2yrs and believe me guys is the best investment! I never ever have problem with this tv. Just the best! Worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Great product and easy set up
Reviews.Author: Sandy W.
Reviews.Content: We love this TV. Great picture and sound quality. We had it set up within 30 minutes. It was a really great buy.

Reviews.Title: Just what I had hoped for.
Reviews.Author: Jim Osborne
Reviews.Content: Good picture.  Good Sound.  Very easy to watch videos and TV shows from laptop using HDMI cable without messing up the aspect ratio.

Reviews.Title: Great simple HDTV
Reviews.Author: WarnerSE
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my mother-in-law.  She isnt all that good with electronics and wanted a no-frills HDTV.  This TV fits the bill perfectly.  The TVs picture is great and the sound is clear and loud.  The bezel around the edge of the TV is not as big as it appears in the pictures.If you are looking for a TV with good sound and picture, and dont need all the bells and whistles, then this is the TV for you.

Reviews.Title: Power Issues
Reviews.Author: E. Myers
Reviews.Content: Bought this NEW from warehouse deals in March.  It's now mid-November and now half the time the TV won't turn on at all.  I have the TV, the Blu Ray Player and the DirecTV DVR on the same power strip but they all work just fine.  Only the TV has the problem. Not happy about this at all.  Anyone else have this problem?

Reviews.Title: Very well satisfied
Reviews.Author: robert b stephenson
Reviews.Content: A little longer than expected shipping but packed very well, no damage at all.. I'm not 'Tecti" so I'm very satisfied with everything about this unit. I'm going to need another smaller set for a different room and it will be a Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN46550
Reviews.Author: job
Reviews.Content: Ordered through Amazon and arrived on time.  Delivery person was helpful in the product unpacking and inspection-- all good.A good value for the price: easy set up, good picture quality, an abundance of different jacks to contact a variety of devices (not often found on TVs in this price range).  We use it in our church with the Sunday School and Bible classes.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: JG Spud "Spud"
Reviews.Content: This item came as advertised.  It works great.  Picture is great. Delivered quickly and in perfect condition.  Setup and running in five minutes.  I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Flat Screen TV
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: Love, love, love my new TV i got thru Amazon.com!  The picture is perfect and just what i needed to fill the empty space that is my entertainment center.  Thank you so much!

Reviews.Title: TV or Monitor
Reviews.Author: greenturtlehope
Reviews.Content: Works great, purchased new over a year ago, still kicking strong. Has lived through been dropped twice, toddler fingers, and toddler slapping and still in perfect condition. I am currently using this as my computer monitor, great resolution and sound quality for playing MMOs.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 37 inch lcd
Reviews.Author: nittwitt
Reviews.Content: I have had this tv installed and running for about a month now.  Even though I don't have it hooked up to Dish with HD, the color is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: samsung tv
Reviews.Author: lenny
Reviews.Content: great picture.  light weight and quick delivery service.  arrive in perfect condition and easy to hook up.  called samsung once to get some information and immediately receive all the info i needed.  amazon price was excellent.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture!
Reviews.Author: Harry Sachs "Dingle"
Reviews.Content: This TV has a beautiful picture, the HD really pops out at you and the sound is great. I am very pleased with my purchase.The only complaint I have is that clear border is useless and it tends to magnify any cords behind the TV. Wish there was a way to easily take it off. Other that that this TV is wonderful!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding picture with very good sound
Reviews.Author: ebporte
Reviews.Content: I have an LN37D550 HDTV for our bed room and purchased the LN40D550 for our family room. Both Samsung TVs are great and I would recommend this TV to family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Yeh
Reviews.Content: My family has watched this TV for about 4 months now and there isn't anything we can complain. We watched movies from DVD and streamed from Roku, We also used it to play Wii. The only thing we plan to do and haven't done is to hook it up with more powerful speakers. It is a very nice TV.

Reviews.Title: Quite Pleased
Reviews.Author: Crompsy
Reviews.Content: We've had it for 4 months now and have been very pleased with the overall quality and flexibility of inputs and outputs. Good stuff.

Reviews.Title: Samsung quality shows
Reviews.Author: Raven A. Wind
Reviews.Content: This is my former television... And I miss it. Unfortunately, I lost it and cannot get it back, and it's a shame because I really liked this HDTV!The picture quality is excellent. The remote is decent. The sound is pretty good, too. Movies and video games look great on this 37" screen, and the connections on the back are all as expected. Very useful, diverse, and sure to have what you need for most modern equipment.Shape/size are quite good too. Samsung has nice designs that don't go overboard, like some manufacturers do. Their bezels are pretty without being gaudy or flashy.All in all, a great HDTV if you're looking for something under 40 inches. Yes, it's "only" an LCD panel (as opposed to LED or plasma), but it has nice quality and looks great.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: George K
Reviews.Content: This 1080i TV is lighter than I thought it would be. It has a beautiful picture with a good array of input ports. It has nice easy controls.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN40D550 40-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LCD HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Bill304
Reviews.Content: I compared a number of similar TV's before my purchase and this was my first choice.The picture quality adjustments, the ease of installation with my cable company, and the adaptability with recording devices all seemed outstanding. It performs even better than I anticipated!A number of competitive TV's cost less, but not to a great degree!In addition, the ease of ordering through Amazon and the delivery by the Merchant was "5 Star"!

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the money!
Reviews.Author: Tcj
Reviews.Content: This tv really gets a great picture and the sound is equally good. No doubt, the more expensive models have more features (that most people never use) but for the money this is a best buy!!!

Reviews.Title: Great picture but not-so-good sound
Reviews.Author: me2you2
Reviews.Content: If the sound were good on this Samsung TV, the rating would be 5 stars.  The picture is excellent! We are adjusting sound up and down on most of the channels. Of course, not any of the TV's we have bought in the last few years has decent sound.  However, Amazon's rating is 5 stars.  It was delivered on time and in perfect condtion.

Reviews.Title: Beware Samsung LCDs
Reviews.Author: R. Casey
Reviews.Content: I have a 32" Samsung LCD that I purchased in July 2010. Within a year, it started turning off, then back on, by itself (power cycling, I've learned). There was a class-action settlement regarding this very frequent Samsung issue with bad capacitors (see numerous chat boards). Unfortunately, my TV was "too new" and just out of warranty to be covered. But check the boards for yourself. Samsungs have excellent pictures, while they last, which isn't long.

Reviews.Title: Xmas in March
Reviews.Author: sarge
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item because of a Consumer Report Rating. It is everything I expected, and more. As I have DIRECTV, a quandry arose whether or not the feed should be by air or cable, as there is no input for satellite, and on my old TV the sat feed inputted to cable.  'Decided on air and is working great, perhaps Samsung could address this in the written instruction or on the Emanual.  Great seller, the free HDMI cable in the box made set-up complete as soon as the box arrived.  Price was great too.

Reviews.Title: Great 40" LCD for the price
Reviews.Author: Sean Smith "smithy4282"
Reviews.Content: This review is specifically for the LN40D550K1FXZA model. A while back I owned a JVC LT-32J300 but unfortunately I had to sell it and go back to using an old Zenith CRT HD set. Recently I picked this model up at best buy. At $550 I'd consider this a reasonable price for a 40" LCD with full 1080p. The picture quality is very good (I will say the picture quality on the JVC was slightly better but that could be due to the size of the screen or other features). The colors really stand out and there is a lot of crisp clear detail. One thing I did notice is sometimes you can see a bit of black crush but this only seems to happen during really dark scenes and I've never really been bothered by this. At first I did not think this TV any any composite plugs. On the back it just appears to have two component plugs. However after reading the manual I found out that the green component plug doubles as the yellow composite plug. There are still only two of these ports in the back but it's nice to have both options. I watched some of an old VHS tape that I have and despite the degraded quality of the tape the picture still look quite good in both 4:3 and stretched to 16:9. Aside from the two component/composite plugs there are plenty of HDMI/DVI ports for all of your other HD devices.At first I would have thought the sound quality wouldn't be that good since from what I can tell the speakers are in the back. This was obviously done to make the front bezel of the TV as small as possible. But despite this the sound quality is very good and I don't have to turn most things about 20 to get good clear sound. The voice on Blade Runner was a bit soft but this probably wasn't the fault of the TV.Now there are some features on this set that I haven't used like the DLNA or any of the web enabled features as I don't have a way to hook it up to a wired internet connection. Right now the only things connected to the TV are an Xbox 360 and an Insignia Blu-Ray player. I have also watched a few upscaled DVDs and the picture quality on this set really improves the overall quality of the DVD.Probably my biggest complaint about the TV is the stand. When I put this together I noticed that a couple of the screws didn't really go in all the way and the stand seemed a bit loose. When I set the TV down on the TV stand I noticed it wasn't very hard to make it wobble from side to side. Now the stand is nice and adjustable so you can turn the TV any way that you need so you can see it. But given the viewing angle of this set you won't really need to do that and it's possible the problems I had with the stand were either due to bad screws or me just not sitting everything right.In conclusion:Pros: great picture quality, very good sound quality, good set of features, slim profile, HD and non-HD plugsCons: stand is a little unsteadySo if you are looking for a great 40" LCD set at a reasonable price I'd definitely give this one a look.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: A. Wicks "Annie W."
Reviews.Content: We have had this television for a few months now. So far, we're really happy with it.  Great picture, decent sound.  We also saved $80 over buying it from BestBuy online because we didn't have to pay sales tax and we paid nothing for 2 days shipping (we're Prime members).

Reviews.Title: Samsung does not disappoint
Reviews.Author: Buck457
Reviews.Content: Considered this model because of good Consumer Reports reviews, particularly the sound quality. Right out of the box, I could tell the sound quality was better than most flat screens.  This model is not ultra-thin, so the speakers can be bigger and point down, rather than back. Spent some time getting the picture settings to my liking. The defaults are too vivid and have too much contrast to be realistic to my eye. Fortunately, there are many adjustments, and by dialing down the contrast and color, the picture quality is now stunning. Excellent picture with cable TV and over the air antenna. Have had the TV for about three months.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding tv
Reviews.Author: Gratefull Shopper
Reviews.Content: Awesome tv-excellent picture quality-i use free tv-no cable-sat-etc-definition is un-real!!lot s of fun features to use if needed.totally amazed by it s picture quality- clarity .as far price-looked locally-on line-amazons affiliates-but as always amazon had the best price.been shoping amz for yr s -outstanding service-price!!!!thanks amazon.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Buy!
Reviews.Author: EricS
Reviews.Content: I bought it because of the great price, the large size, and the high review ratings. I started to doubt it just a bit when I noticed that it wasn't described as being LED back-lit, and I wanted to make sure that the contrast was good and the picture was bright. After I got it home the very next day, with overnight shipping, I set it up. Assembling the stand was easy, it required only a cross-head screwdriver and I was able to put it together in just a few minutes. The batteries for the remote control were included. The only thing that I needed to purchase extra was my HDMI cable to get the best quality picture out of this 1080p HD monster ...and perhaps some 1080p HD movies. I've got the TV hooked up to my PlayStation 3, games and movies look amazing on it! The picture quality is brilliant! The screen size, at 37 inches, is definitely big enough for you to notice all of the little details in a picture. The sound quality is very nice for a built in TV speaker system and the sound-stage is a  bit wider than I expected which is a plus. I must say that I am thoroughly satisfied with my purchase. :D

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: J. Snyder
Reviews.Content: Television has wonderful clarity, and is able to handle fast graphics well in games such as Mass Effect 2 and Batman Arkham City. Inputs and Outputs leave little to nothing to be desired with full hookups for multiple systems and hardware (4 HDMI, 2USB, component, audio in/out, etc...). The dual direction of sound allowed for speaker options without having to use a receiver. It is also a terrific addition to a computer monitor arsenal.

Reviews.Title: Component video hardware issue
Reviews.Author: West Coast
Reviews.Content: Seems to be a great TV, except for:1)  The Red Audio component audio port appears to be out of spec.  Tried 3 different audio cables that worked on my previous TV and none will fit the red component audio port - which I need to connect to DVD and VCR player.  The white and yellow ports are fine.  And the red composite audio port is fine.2) Haven't gotten audio out to work, to the receiver.3) And no video out to record on existing equipment.Samsung support says I need to carry this to a local support place to have it fixed, and the support place doesn't have folks on site.  So will be returning this.

Reviews.Title: Reviewed Already
Reviews.Author: Frank "Squidder"
Reviews.Content: Really like the picture and screen size, and have no negatives to report. Our purchase was based on previous reviews, thank you.

Reviews.Title: Excellent and somewhat expensive for 32"LCD
Reviews.Author: Joe Mann
Reviews.Content: Paid $460 for set and alot of 32" LCD's are less expensive but I'm glad that I spent the extra one hundred plus.  It's a 1080 model with excellent sound for this type of set.  Rmote control is easy to use and the set has more than enough HDMI inputs.  Excellent HD cable and bluray pictures. I've only had the set for one month so I can't speak for the reliablity of the unit.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD TV
Reviews.Author: cj
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the cost. Very good picture with beautiful color. Very easy to operate. Would recommend this product to others.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: J. Kim "ehhh"
Reviews.Content: This TV met my expectations and satisfied my need for a cheap but large HD TV. The picture quality is enough to keep me satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful TV With Outstanding HD Picture!!!
Reviews.Author: JJP
Reviews.Content: WOW! That pretty much sums it all up for this TV! The perfect TV size for a bedroom! This is the second Samsung TV I have purchased from Amazon and highly recommend this TV and Amazon.com!

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN40D550 40-Inch
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: 4 stars only because you cannot manually add or delete channels from the saved channel list.  You can only auto tune or auto delete and it will not delete duplicate channels only those that do not have strong signals.  Due to the annoyance of this to me, I cannot give 5 stars.  However, For all the stuff that matters i.e. ghosting, picture quality, connection location and quantity, and ease of use 100% awesome.  I played several different x-box games on 1080p and they look great no ghosting or lagging!

Reviews.Title: Picture Quality Disappointing
Reviews.Author: bmg102
Reviews.Content: I have had previous positive experiences with Samsung TVs, and with overwhelming positive reviews on this model, I thought I couldn't go wrong. However, after a week I returned the set. This TV had two picture quality issues I just couldn't get over. I'm surprised with this outcome because I don't consider myself very picky when it comes to picture quality.First, some colors, especially purples, were over-bright sometimes to the point of giving the picture a cartoonish quality. I spent hours adjusting the TV, both by trial-and-error and by using picture setting configurations posted on line by pros for this TV, but I never could come up with a satisfactory picture. My parents have a similar Samsung LCD TV that is a couple of years old. The picture on their TV is fine using the default settings (I tried their settings on my TV as well).Second, the picture quality degrades noticeably when viewed off-angle. The TV has a pronounced "sweet spot". Any viewers who are not directly in front of the TV are out-of-luck. This is a weakness of LCD TVs in general, but especially bad on this model.Prior to buying, I viewed this model in a retail store. It looked fine there. The retailer was displaying cherry-picked material that would look good on any TV, however, so I didn't see these flaws until I used the TV in a more realistic environment.Besides the picture, everything else about the TV was ok.Vanns handled my order and they deserve 10 stars. Vanns went out of their way to be helpful and accommodating when processing my return.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality/price ratio
Reviews.Author: Alex B "Alex B"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV based on my previous experience with the 40" size that I bought in 2010. Just like the 40", this is a great "bang for the buck". Good size, plenty of adjustments, etc. The only low-key aspect is the audio: you need to at least get a soundbar if you want decent quality. The audio provided by the two embedded speakers is really weak.

Reviews.Title: Super picture! Super TV!
Reviews.Author: Patti Donzelli
Reviews.Content: We love our new TV. Arrived promptly, easy set up, plenty of spots to plug stuff in. No regrets whatsoever. Color is good and it is simple to operate. We have a small Victorian room and the size is perfect, anything else would be too big. I also don't think the 120Hz would have made a difference.

Reviews.Title: Excellent LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Ramblin Man
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace an CRT TV for my 89 year old mother in law. She's in an assisted living facility with very small rooms, so space and simplicity was at a premium.  She loves the TV and was able to turn it on and off and select her favorite channels.  Once we got her cable signal fixed, the display is great even though she only gets an SD signal.

Reviews.Title: DVD player compatability
Reviews.Author: outdoorsdiva
Reviews.Content: This is ny first HDTV. Set up was simple and it's a great picture. One thing that didn't work is that i couldn't get any sound and only got a grainy black and white picture playing DVDs with my low end Curtis DVD1041 player.  Do I need a HDTV compatible DVD player to play simple exercise videos and such?

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: David W. Cant "blacklee"
Reviews.Content: Very nice tv, beautiful picture, fits well in my bedroom, fast shipping, well packed. A lovely present to my self. Rated #1 by CR

Reviews.Title: Happ with this HDTV
Reviews.Author: James Ray
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my bedroom. I already had a 47" 1080, 120 in my living room and am very pleased with it. I think Samsung has one of the better picture qualities out there. I have the TV hooked up with a Samsung blue-ray player and they work wonderful together. When you turn on the blue-ray player the TV gets turned on and gets set, automatically, to the correct source channel.

Reviews.Title: 100% satisfied
Reviews.Author: Zareh
Reviews.Content: look is great, picture quality is great, menu is great, price is great, my concern was 60hz but now i am completely satisfied with this TV and the price is excellent also.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 37" tv review
Reviews.Author: Marjorie Cassady
Reviews.Content: The Samsung 37" TV that I ordered from Amazon arrived about 2 days earlier than I thought when I placed the order.  I didn't have to worry about picking it up from the store or trying to fit it into my car.  I knew when it would arrive by simply clicking on the "tracking" entry on the order confirmation.  Ordering from Amazon is easy and much less stressful for me than having to manipulate the store, the pick up and the unloading.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 inch TV
Reviews.Author: William A. Barrett "Allen"
Reviews.Content: We have two other Samsung model TV's and were very satisfied with them. This is a great TV at a great price.  I have purchased a number of items thru Amazon and could not be more satisfied with them, especially now that they have  special shipping at no cost.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a great price
Reviews.Author: TU Faculty
Reviews.Content: I looked around at different LCD TVs that were full HD.  for the price, this was one of the best.  We mounted it on the wall in our work out room and it works great.

Reviews.Title: Misled by both Amazon Customer Reviews and Consumer Reports
Reviews.Author: Blaise
Reviews.Content: I received this television as a gift for Christmas 2011. I was eager to see the set in action because this was my household's first HDTV, heck, the first panel that was flat and didn't weigh 40 + pounds. I researched this set, along with dozens of others, before narrowing down my wish list to 3 sets from different manufacturers. Each set was highly rated on Amazon and Consumer Reports, so the last thing I expected was a problem.At first, the tv worked fine; however, I was somewhat disappointed with the colors when I saw the screen light up for the first time. I remember walking through many electronics retailers and seeing more vibrant pictures for televisions of the same size, and equal to or less than the price I paid. I dismissed my concern as a matter of me being unable to alter the color settings to a more agreeable picture.In early March, the tv began to show two vertical lines that were running from the top of the screen to the bottom of the screen. They are not always noticeable, but they are lighter in color compared to the rest of the screen, and consistently reappear in the same spots on the screen during nighttime shots in films or on shows. I contacted Samsung, and they do what every customer service department does for companies, blamed me, my cable company, and the wires and accessories I use with my set (DVD players, Video game systems, etc.)I waited to see if the problem would disappear but it did not. It is now June and I am shipping my set to Samsung in NJ to make them figure it out. They told me if they find nothing wrong with it, I have to pay $80.00 for shipping. Something tells me my future is looking grim with this set.

Reviews.Title: Marina
Reviews.Author: Marina Sennet
Reviews.Content: Under NO CIRCUMSTANCES would I EVER Buy a Samsung TV again! I owned a 32 inch LCD that had the capacitor problem. I called the customer service number and, after being disconnected no fewer than EIGHT times, was told by various customer service reps that 1) a service person would contact me for in home service (never happened) 2) I needed to ship the TV back to them UPS to have it repaired 3) they would issue me a $300 refund 4) no, they won't issue a refund 5) they have a service man available to fix it but not at a time I can arrange so.... basically they make a poor quality product and when their customer service doesn't disconnect you, they tell you conflicting and incorrect things. I'm putting the damned thing by the side of the road because it will cost me less to replace it than to take the time off work to have their "free" repair. NEVER AGAIN. Tell everyone you know.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed in Samsung
Reviews.Author: JimB93
Reviews.Content: Got my Samsung LN37D550K1 yesterday.  Box undamaged, TV not visibly damaged.  Set it up and turned it on and discovered the screen had shattered inside the panel. It was unwatchable.  Called Amazon who opened a case and promised to get back to me in 24 hours.  Called Samsung who told me that I was on my own since this was an "internal failure" and not covered at all by Samsung (what other kind of problem can a TV have except an "internal failure").Five years ago I bought another Samsung 52 inch LCD TV. Two years later it died with the same capacitor defect that many other Samsung owners had also experienced with this model.  Again Samsung told me it was not covered.  Samsung service wanted $1500 to fix it.  But yesterday I also learned that Samsung had lost a Class Action Lawsuit by its customers (Google: Samsung Capacitor Class Action) and had been forced to fix this problem for everyone at Samsung's expense.  I had never been advised of this remedy by Samsung even though the product was registered with Samsung and I had placed a service ticket with Samsung on the problem.So be cautious before buying Samsung.  They TV's are great when they work.  When they stop working you are on your own.Amazon just sent me an email confirming they will replace the LN37D550K.  So Kudos to Amazon, they have confirmed my faith in them.  But shame on Samsung.  They have badly let me down twice and it seems they only respond after being sued.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV for my price..
Reviews.Author: D.J.Walter
Reviews.Content: I picked this TV up last night as an "open box" at Target.. The TV was never used or turned on.. Happend to be that it was returned and the box was ripped so they had to sell it as open box. Price? $349.00.. Someone at Target royally screwed up the pricing. I got the 40" btw.. Enough about the price bragging..I would have easily paid retail for this TV. The TV is bright and color rendition is one of the best I've seen. (not sure what Cnet has been looking at). Plenty of ports for accessories. You can't go wrong with this set.Cons- I did see some (slight) pixelation(sp?) while watching a Bluray last night. Standard definiation looks great. I'm yet to play any video games on this tv but the PS3 home screen looks awesome. MW3 should be as well. Pick up this entry level 1080 LCD I think you'll be impressed especially at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: Sturdy base and picture looks great.  Only complaint is that some of the ports are on the side and not in the back.  Not really sure why they would design it like that.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 40 in 1080P TV
Reviews.Author: Rocky
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv and hoped that the Samsung name was still the best.  Watch out, this TV sucks!  I've now tried for about three weeks to make it work but it has a serious flaw in the design.  The TV has three input ports, one of the TV, one for the DVD and a third USB port for a memory stick.  The TV HDMI port is so poorly designed that the input HDMI cable won't stay in place so forget about watching TV without at best in and out reception and normally it doesn't work at all.  BEWARE.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Phyne Hartwig
Reviews.Content: I have been told by a dear friend that Samsung is the best tv.  I had a 47" Magnavox that cratered in 3 years and I was devastated, so instead of having it fixed I just purchased a Samsung.  I was very happy with the Magnavox and sorry it gave out.  The Samsung is nice, but it lacks some really neat features that the Magnavox had, such as;  Samsung does not show what is playing on each channel; letters too small to read; CC cannot be read by me.  Letters not clear, after trying for some time to get the sound to mono instead of stereo I chatted with person on line from Samsung chat and he said I couldn't change the sound on digital.  That is totally ridiculous and I can't believe that Samsung would be that short-sighted.  The Samsung is 46" and the Magnavox was 47".  I really didn't think there would be any difference but found out I was wrong again.  The Magavox had much better color and picture.  I guess the only thing I can hope for is that the Samsung will last much longer than 3 years.  I can only hope.BTW, It was set to arrive on a certain day and I waited all day and never heard a word.  I finally called the company that was sending it and it had arrived here the day before and I should have been called then to deliver it the next day.  Since they didn't do that they set it up for the following Monday.  I waited most of the day after they called and said it would be there between 8am and 1pm....when I finally reached them around 2pm they tried to reset for the next day and I insisted they bring it out the day they moved it to or send it back.  They brought it out that evening.

Reviews.Title: FLAT SCREEN
Reviews.Author: GEORGE
Reviews.Content: THE SAMSUNG FLAT SCREEN I PURCHASED IS AN EXCELLENT BUY.  BOTH PICTURE AND SOUND IS CRISP.MY WIFE AND I ARE ENJOYING THIS PURCHASE.i don't know if this is apropos, but I have been charged for 2 units on my credit card bill. Can you do something about this. I only have one unit.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: B. Steele
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN32D55o 32 inch HDTV.  Picture quality good and sound is good.  Ease of use is also good.  We have Direct TV and are pleased "so far".  We were also pleased to be able to get 1080 px as most of this size we looked at had only 750 px so picture is better.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Becky Hendrickson "bhendrxn"
Reviews.Content: The TV came very QUICKLY via Fed Ex and was packaged very well to avoid damage. One of the easiest transactions I've ever had. The price is FANTASTIC compared to the $809 price tag for the EXACT model at Sears. That means I got this tv for a little more than 50% off! My husband said I did good so I have to praise them for offering such a great tv at an even greater price with no hassle at all! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I needed
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: My specifications for getting an upgrade on my TV was that it has to be larger than 26 inches, 1080p, and less than 500 dollars. This TV delivers on all of those.

Reviews.Title: I've had this for more then a month...love it
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: Nice TV.  Great price.  I look at TVs in the stores and can't believe what people pay!  The delevery was extra nice.  HOw can you beat it when they will loaded on their own truck and drive it right to your front door....no hassles for me.

Reviews.Title: Samsung is the best
Reviews.Author: Gandalf "the Grey"
Reviews.Content: I love my new Samsung TV.  Very nice display with a sharp image.  I like the list of shows that are coming up in the next 24 hours.

Reviews.Title: Bigger, brighter
Reviews.Author: T. Meier
Reviews.Content: I bought this 37" Samsung to replace a 26" set in my bedroom. It has ample features and certainly fills more wallspace than the previous set. My only criticism would be that the viewing angle clarity is much less than my previous Sony set.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: George Patten
Reviews.Content: Samsung name speaks for itself as the TV quality and price made this a great buy. The delivery was prompt and the picture made me very happy. Easy to hook up and adjust. Perfect picture and audio was great. Price was great.GKP

Reviews.Title: Loses sound occasionally via HDMI to FIOS cable box.
Reviews.Author: Homer Pyle
Reviews.Content: This television is easy enough to set up, but should be bought on sale.  I have Verizon FIOS tv at home and via HDMI, I occasionally lose the audio even though the picture is fine.  I have to turn the set off then on again to get the sound back.  Once in a while I have to turn the tv off and on a couple of times.

Reviews.Title: Would've loved it...if it worked
Reviews.Author: Ariel G.
Reviews.Content: Showed up promptly from Amazon shipping to my work so I could make sure it wasn't stolen or bashed around being left on my doorstep. Managed to get it up on my wall mount, hooked up to all the devices and...it had a big green line down the center because it was damaged in shipping. Thankfully I saved the box! I read all the great reviews on this TV and was so disappointed that I couldn't get a replacement. I ended up getting a 40" Sony instead at Best Buy from their open box sales. Best recommendation: when buying this or any TV, save the box and plug it in on the ground before bothering to set it all up and make sure your supplier has a good return policy. Fortunately Amazon had a 30 day no questions asked return policy so it wasn't too bad to return, just disappointing that I had another few weeks without a TV.

Reviews.Title: Well, the picture is not so good at all. It seems like a TV who had problems before.
Reviews.Author: INSTITUTION CHRETIENNE D'HAITI "icdh"
Reviews.Content: I have samsung before but this model is not so good. The picture quality is poor. You have to go through a lot of maneuvering to be able to have a movie play on USB drive compared to the easy way of LG.I am not satisfied with the model.

Reviews.Title: samsung ln32d550 32-inch 1080p 60hz lcd hdtv
Reviews.Author: tomk
Reviews.Content: It was easy to carry. Fit rite in the car. Set up was a snap. And the plays (football) are awesome.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV but no how long it took to get here
Reviews.Author: H. Miller
Reviews.Content: We love the TV however it took two weeks to get it here.  When it is replacing your main TV that is a very long time.  The delivery went well and the company was good communicating with us.

Reviews.Title: Poor Sound Quality
Reviews.Author: Disappointed Buyer
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv to replace an older Samsung 40" LCD.  Both tv's have 2 @ 10 watt speakers in the back.  The older tv had decent sound, but the speakers started to rattle after a couple of years.  The new tv has horrible speakers regardless of the setting chosen in the onboard setup.  The sound is "tinny" when listening to most shows.  Seems to be able to get decent sound if you play with all the settings, but when changing channels you must make adjustments once again. On Comcast cable, definite difference in sound between high definition and standard programs. Seems that Samsung engineers missed the mark with this one.  Shopping now for external speakers in hopes of correcting Samsung's mistakes.

Reviews.Title: Bad picture quality!
Reviews.Author: T-mo customer
Reviews.Content: Right out of the box - I knew I needed to play with the settings for  picture! It was too bright and sort of noisy. I bought two TVs..same size and the same price, except one was SONY. The Sony had a amazing picture,and it did auto-adjust for room lighting levels. The Samsung just stuck there with the same bright picture that was painful to look at.Two hours later after playing with the settings I was able to bring it to an OK quality...but nothing even close to the SONY TV. In the evening I had to readjust the settings again because the picture became too bright again. I hate the remote..not very intuitive and too big.I am so disappointed with this TV as I absolutely love Samsung products and trying to stay away from Sony because of their horrible customer service, but this one is going back to the store!

Reviews.Title: Samsung has the worst customer service.
Reviews.Author: Lady Bambi "*~Lady Bambi~*"
Reviews.Content: Samsung has the worst customer support. I bought a 37 " LCD last October 2011. It should still be under warranty, right? One year Samsung warranty? So I went to the Samsung web site and let them know exactly what was wrong with the t.v. I was told somebody would call me back soon. I called them Monday, Tuesday, and Wednesday. Nobody from Samsung has told me how I am going to get my t.v fixed. Today I called again and the service rep from Samsung tried to trick me and tell me that my warranty expired Aug 19, 2012. Hmmm how convenient for Samsung. I did send her my receipt showing the purchase was made Oct 7th, 2011. I still don't know what I will do. One thing for sure. I will never buy another Samsung again. I am going to warn all my friends and family never to buy a Samsung product again because the customer service is pathetic.

Reviews.Title: Beware the Samsung white screen of death
Reviews.Author: Felix
Reviews.Content: Bought a Samsung LCD TV three years ago and the screen recently went all white.  This is a known production problem with Samsung screens (try Googling: Samsung white screen), but the company refuses to replace the defective set or pick up the cost of repair once it's outside of the meager 1-year warranty.I will never again buy a Samsung product.Buyer beware.
